forum: An error occoured while contacting the forums API.
playerLeaderboard: An error occoured while fetching the player leaderboard.
profile: An error occoured while fetching the player's profile.
punishments: An error occoured while fetching data from the punishments API.
server: An error occoured while fetching data from the server API.
staff: An error occoured while fetching the staff list.
totalLeaderboard: An error occoured while fetching the total leaderboard.
voteLeaderboard: An error occoured while fetching the vote leaderboard.
responseCode: The API didn't return response code 200.
invalidLeaderboardType: Invalid leaderboard type in type parameter. (points/reactionScore/messages)
serverOffline: Server is offline or invalid IP.
noIPAddressFound: No IP address found for the domain.
xf_session: Failed to get the xf_session cookie
xf_user: Failed to get the xf_user cookie
